item.title: Celcius – Picante 🌶️
item.content:
## If you are looking for that perfect sizzling flavor, look no further than the Picante like Salsa.
### Passed down from the Mexican families to this generation.
The best taste of a great “Salsa”, but with a kick, in a very familiar package. Enjoy!
item.description: Came from the farthest corners of Mexico a thousand Years recipe that is now available to those fans that cannot to enjoy resist the spicy of a great “Salsa”.
